message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it's valued at $12,000 by us. Considering its worth to you is $8,000, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it offers significant savings compared to the market value. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
